name: Apple Pie Bites Recipe by Tasty
description: Here's what you need: green apple, almond butter, maple syrup, vanilla extract, rolled oats, cinnamon, salt
recipeIngredient: ⅓ cup grated green apple, excess liquid squeezed out
¼ cup maple syrup or honey
recipeInstructionSteps: In a medium bowl, combine the grated apple, almond butter, maple syrup, and vanilla, and stir until smooth.
Add the oats, cinnamon, and salt, and mix until evenly distributed.
Chill in the refrigerator for 30 minutes.
Use a tablespoon to scoop out the mixture, then roll into balls with your hands.
Store in the refrigerator in an airtight container for up to 1 week.
